column4: alright, i'm trying to enable dual monitors in my gfx settings (nvidia) and when i hit save to x it says that it's unable to create a back of xorg.conf so it doesn't save it
in terminal type  gksudo nvidia-settings  ..that will allow you to save to xorg.conf
then restart X after you've made the changes. all set
what's the command for that again? ctrl alt backspace seems to be disabled, and it's been a few years since using linux :/
